bcbioSingleCell 0.2.1

  • Changelog

Subset Per Sample

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/subsetPerSample-methods.R
subsetPerSample.Rd

Subset Per Sample

subsetPerSample(object, ...)

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
subsetPerSample(object, minCells = 200L,
  prefilter = TRUE, assignAndSave = FALSE, envir = parent.frame(),
  dir = ".")

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
minCells

scalar integer. Minimum number of cells required per sample.
prefilter

boolean. Apply prefiltering to remove zero count genes.
assignAndSave

boolean. Assign and save the individual datasets.
envir

environment. Where to assign the subsets. Only applicable when assignAndSave = TRUE.
dir

string. Output directory. Only applicable when assignAndSave = TRUE.

Value

  • assignAndSave = FALSE: Per sample objects in a list.

  • assignAndSave = TRUE: Subset file paths.

See also

Other Data Functions: aggregateReplicates, cell2sample, metricsPerSample, sampleData, selectSamples, topBarcodes

Examples

# List mode (default)
list <- subsetPerSample(indrops_small, assignAndSave = FALSE)
#> 1 sample(s) matched: rep_1
#> 500 cells matched
#> Parameters:
#>   - >= 0 UMIs per cell
#>   - <= Inf UMIs per cell
#>   - >= 0 genes per cell
#>   - <= Inf genes per cell
#>   - >= 0 novelty score
#>   - <= 1 mitochondrial abundance
#>   - == Inf cells per sample
#>   - >= 1 cells per gene
#> ================================================================================
#> Cells:
#>      500 cells | prefilter
#>      500 cells | minUMIs >= 0
#>      500 cells | maxUMIs <= Inf
#>      500 cells | minGenes >= 0
#>      500 cells | maxGenes <= Inf
#>      500 cells | minNovelty <= 0
#>      500 cells | maxMitoRatio <= 1
#>      500 cells | nCells == Inf
#> 
#> rep_1 
#>   500 
#> ================================================================================
#> Genes:
#>      500 genes | prefilter
#>      500 genes | minCellsPerGene >= 1
#> ================================================================================
#> Summary:
#>   - 500 of 500 cells passed filtering (100%)
#>   - 500 of 500 genes passed filtering (100%)
names(list)
#> [1] "multiplexed_AAAAAAAA"

# Assign and save mode (useful for large datasets)
subsetPerSample(
    object = indrops_small,
    assignAndSave = TRUE,
    envir = parent.frame(),
    dir = "subsetPerSample"
)
#> 1 sample(s) matched: rep_1
#> 500 cells matched
#> Parameters:
#>   - >= 0 UMIs per cell
#>   - <= Inf UMIs per cell
#>   - >= 0 genes per cell
#>   - <= Inf genes per cell
#>   - >= 0 novelty score
#>   - <= 1 mitochondrial abundance
#>   - == Inf cells per sample
#>   - >= 1 cells per gene
#> ================================================================================
#> Cells:
#>      500 cells | prefilter
#>      500 cells | minUMIs >= 0
#>      500 cells | maxUMIs <= Inf
#>      500 cells | minGenes >= 0
#>      500 cells | maxGenes <= Inf
#>      500 cells | minNovelty <= 0
#>      500 cells | maxMitoRatio <= 1
#>      500 cells | nCells == Inf
#> 
#> rep_1 
#>   500 
#> ================================================================================
#> Genes:
#>      500 genes | prefilter
#>      500 genes | minCellsPerGene >= 1
#> ================================================================================
#> Summary:
#>   - 500 of 500 cells passed filtering (100%)
#>   - 500 of 500 genes passed filtering (100%)
#> Saving multiplexed_AAAAAAAA to /Users/mike/GitHub/bcbioSingleCell/docs/reference/subsetPerSample
list.files("subsetPerSample")
#> [1] "multiplexed_AAAAAAAA.rda"

# Clean up
unlink("subsetPerSample", recursive = TRUE)
